openclawForks.name: IronClaw
openclawForks.description: OpenClaw fork focused on gameplay and engine improvements.

openclawForks.name: OpenClaw-Composio
openclawForks.description: OpenClaw fork with integrated Composio plugin for easy tool authentication

openclawForks.name: secure-openclaw
openclawForks.description: A personal 24x7 AI assistant like OpenClaw that runs on your messaging platforms. Send a message on WhatsApp, Telegram, Signal, or iMessage and get responses from Claude with full tool access, persistent memory, scheduled reminders, and integrations with 500+ apps.

skillsMarketplace.name: Awesome OpenClaw Skills
skillsMarketplace.description: The awesome collection of OpenClaw Skills. Formerly known as Moltbot, originally Clawdbot.

skillsMarketplace.name: OpenClaw Skills Library
skillsMarketplace.description: Moltbot skill library for AI agents. Including polymarket, crypto trading, DeFi operations, automation, and more. Open a PR to add skills.
